Class ScreenEvent.KeyboardKeyPressedEvent.Pre

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event

net.minecraftforge.client.event.ScreenEvent.KeyboardKeyPressedEvent
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ScreenEvent.KeyboardKeyPressedEvent.Pre
Enclosing class:
ScreenEvent.KeyboardKeyPressedEvent
public static class ScreenEvent.KeyboardKeyPressedEvent.Pre extends ScreenEvent.KeyboardKeyPressedEvent
This event fires when keyboard input is detected for a GuiScreen, before it is handled. Cancel this event to bypass GuiEventListener.keyPressed(int, int, int).
